meanings.definition: Conforming to a standard; usual, typical, or expected.
meanings.sent1: It is normal to eat breakfast in the morning.
meanings.sent2: Wearing shoes to school is a normal practice.
meanings.sent3: The normal routine of brushing teeth before bed was forgotten by the sleepy child.
meanings.sent4: The normal flow of traffic suddenly stopped due to a fallen tree.
meanings.sent5: The normal chirping of birds greeted the hiker on the trail.

meanings.definition: Free from mental or physical disorders; sane.
meanings.sent1: She seemed normal and happy after the long vacation.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the patient's test results were normal.
meanings.sent3: The normal behavior of the cat made the owner smile.
meanings.sent4: His normal way of thinking helped him solve the problem quickly.
meanings.sent5: The normal heartbeat of the baby brought relief to the worried parents.

meanings.sent1: The normal position of the bookshelf was against the wall.
meanings.sent2: The table legs were adjusted to ensure they were normal to the floor.
meanings.sent3: The normal angle of the tree branch made it perfect for hanging a swing.
meanings.sent4: The normal intersection of the roads created a four-way stop.
meanings.sent5: The normal alignment of the picture frame made the room look tidy.
